title: Ranked teams fun with the boys
body:
Hey ladies and gents looking for members to play ranked teams with the boys. Need to have a sense of humour and be able to take a lot of shit. 
We don't like serious deadbeats who have no sense of humour or aren't chilled and take the game to seriously. 

We win lots by having fun anyways. 

Gold and under hmu on here or add my ign league. 
Big Chief Poon

Pref players that are flexible with all lanes. Cheers. Poon
